document.full_text: emerging nations are still conducting "lots of consultations" about choosing a candidate from their ranks to head the international monetary fund, south african finance minister pravin gordhan said on tuesday.
document.title: emerging states working on imf candidate: south africa
lines_and_colors: emerging nations are still conducting "lots of consultations" about choosing a candidate from their ranks to head the international monetary fund, south african finance minister pravin gordhan said on tuesday.
